docs.title: Welcome to My Website!
docs.text:
Hi, my name is 李治勇(Li Zhiyong), but you can aslo call me Chris!

I made this website at 2023/10/25, And I hope I can

For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: ACG
docs.text: I will try to share all the anime, manga and games that I have watched, read and played here.

docs.title: God Tier
docs.text:
• とらぶる(To Love Ru)

My first anime, really dragged me into the world of anime.

  • とらドラ！

docs.title: Self Introduction
docs.text: Hello! My name is 李治勇(Li Zhiyong), but you can also call me Chris! I'm currently studying in the Lee Lab at the University of Tsukuba.

docs.title: Language
docs.text:
• Chinese: Native
  • Japanese: Fluent
  • English: Fluent
  • Korean: Basic
  • Dutch: Still trying to do the rolling r

docs.title: Boxing
docs.text: I started my boxing "career" from 23/6 at Tsukuba boxing gym.
